TopicTitle: Return to Ship in Map Mode

Articles.Content:
Used to be the "~" key.  Cool if it changes...but it sort of didn't.  I just had to right click and destroy a ship because I couldn't swap back to it.  (Couldn't swap camera back to ship after looking at another craft orbiting minmus because ((Darn it one cannot look at minmus and click it after something else is orbiting it...another bug)) return to ship/center camera or whatever didn't work. 

Looking at the controls as listed on Escape Menu - Settings - Input :

Under 'EVA' it mentions Center camera in VAB as I and K ....  odd

Under 'OAB' it mentions Center camera in VAB as 'Home' ... ok...

Under 'MAPVIEW' it mentions 'resetCamera' as 'Home'  ...

 

Yeah I don't get it.

Ok I take it back...I just tried it a dozen other times with other ships and Home key works fine. 

GRRRRRRR

In the off chance this is a logic bug, the ship I was trying to swap to had no power.  Otherwise disregard.
